PRAV.description: First iteration of my personal website made using Sass and Vanilla Javascript. Contains dynamically generated content and clear user interface

Weatherly.description: Weatherly is a user-friendly website that seamlessly integrates with Google Maps to provide you with accurate and up-to-date weather information for any location around the world

Invespo.description: Invespo: A stock trading front-end for SWE 632 course @ George Mason Univ. Built with HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery. Explores interface design principles in user-centric design.

Amazon Product Information Scraper.description: This Python web-scraping project retrieves product names, prices, review stars, and review counts for a specific product category.

Youtube Playlist Video Downloader.description: Continuously downloads the latest videos added to the specified playlist. Made with Python and PyTube library

Newton Classroom Automation.description: A bot that utilizes webscraping techniques to navigate through the Google Meet interface, enter specified classes at the designated times, and exit the classes once the sessions are complete.

Horizon Airlines Bookings*.description: Horizon Airlines Bookings is a Flask and MongoDB web app that streamlines flight bookings and management. This project is for the INFS 740 course at George Mason University, Spring 2023.

Patriot Board*.description: Final project for SWE 632 course at George Mason University: This project aims to improve the design process of user interfaces.

K-Means Algorithm on Iris Dataset*.description: Implementation of the K-Means algorithm and it's application Iris dataset. The task is to assign each instance to one of three cluster IDs, namely 1, 2, or 3.

Drug Activity Prediction*.description: Predict whether a drug compound is active or not using binary classification models like Naive Bayes and Decision Tree Classifier

Drug Activity Prediction with Adaboost*.description: Predict whether a drug compound is active or not using  Naive Bayes and Adaboost boosting technique
